name: UConstantQSettings
doc:
UConstantQSettings

Settings for a UConstantQ analyzer.

StartingFrequencyHz: Starting frequency for first bin of CQT
NumBands: Total number of resulting constant Q bands.
NumBandsPerOctave: Number of bands within an octave.
AnalysisPeriodInSeconds: Number of seconds between cqt measurements
bDownmixToMono: If true, multichannel audio is downmixed to mono with equal amplitude scaling. If false, each channel gets it's own CQT result.
WindowType: Type of window to be applied to input audio
BandWidthStretch: Stretching factor to control overlap of adjacent bands.
CQTNormalization: Normalization scheme used to generate band windows.
NoiseFloorDb: Noise floor to use when normalizing CQT
